fields.description:
Description:
It seems that the footer (Base UI>Vertical Layout> Basic) is being rendered in the center of the screen. This remains true regardless of device rotation.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Vertical Layout> Basic
3) Rotate device

Result:
Footer renders in center of screen

Expected:
Footer renders at bottom of screen
fields.summary: Android: Vertical Layout- v8/Rhino - Footer does not remain at the bottom of the screen or in sync relative to other UI elements
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111108105548, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler & Rhino compiler
